genericobj module¶

Provide object<–>dict flexibility, along with a __str__ that’s really useful in debugging. Probably also workable as a mixin. __init__ is left as an exercise to the reader, keep reading.

class genericobj.GenericObject(asdict=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: genericobj.objstr

Takes a dict and/or a set of kwargs, create an object.

class genericobj.objstr¶

Bases: object

get(key, default=None)¶
